ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared
Interface Microscope

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
MicroscopeRMI
public interface Microscope
extends java.rmi.Remote

This interface represents the microscope and allows access to its devices, its configuration and its camera.

Author:
Moritz Lang

Method Summary
 MicroscopeConfiguration getConfiguration()
          Returns an interface representing the configuration of the microscope server.
 MicroscopeControl getControl()
          Returns an interface with which the microscope can be controlled.
 MicroscopeInformation getInformation()
          Returns an interface describing the configuration and the state of the microscope.
 

Method Detail

getControl

MicroscopeControl getControl()
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns an interface with which the microscope can be controlled.

Returns:
Control interface of the microscope.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getInformation

MicroscopeInformation getInformation()
                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns an interface describing the configuration and the state of the microscope.

Returns:
Configuration of the microscope.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getConfiguration

MicroscopeConfiguration getConfiguration()
                                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns an interface representing the configuration of the microscope server. All these settings will be saved between startups.

Returns:
The configuration interface.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
